dta.Path¶

class dta.Path(net, name, iterLinks)¶

Bases: object

A path in the network represented by a sequence of links that are connected to each other

__init__(net, name, iterLinks)¶

Constructor that accepts a network, the path name, and a sequence of connected links instances

classmethod createPath(net, name, intersectionList, cutoff=0.69999999999999996)¶

Returns a Path instance based on a shortest path that goes through all the intersections in the intersection list

  • net is a Network object

  • intersectionList is a list of at least two intersections that the path will go through having the form:

    e.g. : [["Mission St", "1st St"], ["Mission St", "8th St"]]

getCrossStreetName(node)¶

Return the cross street name for the node that belongs to the path

Return the first link in the path

Get the first node in the path

Return the last link in the path

Return the last node in the path

getLengthInFeet()¶

Get the length of the path in feet

getLengthInMiles()¶

Get the length of the path in miles

getName()¶

Get the name of the path

getNumLinks()¶

Get the number of links in the path

getSimSpeedInMPH(startTimeInMin, endTimeInMin)¶

Get the simulated speed in mph durin the specified interval

getSimTTInMin(startTimeInMin, endTimeInMin)¶

Return the simulated travel time in minutes for the specified time period

getSimTTInMinToLink(endLink, startTimeInMin, timeStepInMin)¶

Return the simulated travel time in minutes for the specified time period

iterLinks()¶

Return an iterator to the edges of the path

iterLinksInReverse()¶

Return an iterator to the links in the path in reverse order

iterNodes()¶

Return an iterator to the nodes in the path

Write the paths as a shapefile
